rquery
  • Reference
  • Sponsor: Win-Vector LLC

Return vector of table names used.

Return vector of table names used.

tables_used(node)

Arguments

node

rquery tree to examine

Value

character vector of tables referenced in calculation.

Examples


my_db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
d1 <- dbi_copy_to(my_db, 'd1',
                 data.frame(AUC = 0.6, R2 = 0.2))
d2 <- dbi_copy_to(my_db, 'd2',
                 data.frame(AUC = 0.6, D = 0.3))
eqn <- natural_join(d1, d2)
cat(format(eqn))
#> table('d1') %.>%
#>  natural_join(.,
#>   table('d2'),
#>   j= INNER, by= AUC)
print(tables_used(eqn))
#> [1] "d1" "d2"
DBI::dbDisconnect(my_db)

Contents

  • Value
